projectGridLines.title: Breaking Monolith to micro service
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Real life business usecase of breaking monolith to microservice for scale

Skill sets: NodeJs Python, Database(MongoDb, Postgres)

Traits expectation: Strong analytical skills, attention to detail, ability to work in a team.

Expected learning: Students will gain hands-on experience with microservice technology,

boundary context, When and why to build microservice, scaling of services and real-world

application development.

Specific courses required for project execution: Computer Science, Data Structures

and algorithms and database

projectGridLines.title: DevOps understanding and pipelines
projectGridLines.description:
Description: New age devops pipelines with K8s, Jenkins, git, argoCD, ES, AWS, technology

migration to new stacks , monitoring.

Skill sets: git, K8S, AWS, Databases, Python, Terraform

Traits expectation: Creative problem-solving, programming proficiency, and ability to learn

new technologies.

Expected learning: Students will develop skills in reallife industry devops pipeline and cloud

infrastructure.

Specific courses required for project execution: DevOps, AWS

projectGridLines.title: Streaming, analytics and general development
projectGridLines.description:
Description: Cutting edge streaming solutions, Business analytics, data engineering

Skill sets: webrtc, mqtt, analytics DB, golang, nodejs, python, reactjs

Traits expectation: Creative problem-solving, programming proficiency, and ability to learn

new technologies.

Expected learning: Sudents will gain hands-on experience with Streaming, data engineering,

frontend and backend

Specific courses required for project execution: Computer Science, Data Structures

and algorithms and database

projectGridLines.title: Image to Mesh: Efficient 3D Object creation from 2D Images
projectGridLines.description:
Description: This project will involve researching and developing novel Computer Vision

algorithms that can take a sparse set of images in one or more views and generate a 3D

object from the images.

Skill sets: Python programming (pytorch, tensorflow libraries etc.), Machine Learning (focus

on Computer Vision)

Traits expectation: Creative problem-solving, programming proficiency, and ability to learn

new technologies

Expected learning: Students will develop skills in machine learning, particularly in image

recognition applications.

Specific courses required for project execution: Artificial Intelligence, Machine Learning, Data

Science, Object Oriented Programming

projectGridLines.title: Few Shot Learning for Computer Vision Applications
projectGridLines.description:
Description: This project will involve researching and developing novel Computer Vision

algorithms with specific focus on techniques such as Domain Adaptation and Knowledge

Distillation to evolve a pre-trained model to previously unseen Image classes.

Skill sets: Python programming (pytorch, tensorflow libraries etc.), Machine Learning (focus

on Computer Vision)

Traits expectation: Creative problem-solving, programming proficiency, and ability to learn

new technologies

Expected learning: Students will develop skills in machine learning, particularly in image

recognition applications.
